body.name: babyletto Yuzu Convertible All-Stages Bassinet, Midi, Full-Size Crib in Natural Walnut, Greenguard Gold Certified, Portable & Adjustable with Conversion Kits and Pads Included
features: GROWS AT THEIR PACE & ADAPTS TO YOUR SPACE: Transitions from bassinet (29.75”x19.75”x30.75”) to transitional midi size (37.5”x29.75”x30.75”) and to standard full-size crib & junior bed. Suitable from newborn to 5 y/o

ALL-STAGES 8-IN-1 CONVERTIBILITY: 8 conversions across 3 unique sizes to fit your family & home: bassinet, midi crib, midi toddler bed, midi daybed, full-size crib, full toddler bed, full daybed, and junior bed

PORTABLE & ADJUSTABLE HEIGHT: Yuzu glides easily from room to room on removable locking caster wheels in each stage. For safe co-sleeping, adjust between four height options in the bassinet and midi stages, and three heights for the full-size crib

WHAT'S INCLUDED: Everything but the full-size mattress! Purchase includes all hardware and parts needed to convert to any and all stages, plus a 1” bassinet pad & custom 2” midi pad (note: not standard mini crib size)

GREENGUARD GOLD CERTIFIED: Yuzu has undergone scientific testing for 10,000+ chemical emissions & VOCs, contributing to cleaner indoor air. Finished in a non-toxic & lead safe painting process which exceeds ASTM International & U.S. CPSC safety standards
body.description: Yuzu 8-in-1 All-Stages Crib features gently curved corners & feet. Convert from bassinet to a transitional midi size, and then to standard crib or junior bed. Choose from several mattress heights & configurations in each size. All conversion kits included

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Yuzu 3-Drawer Changer Dresser Yuzu 6-Drawer Dresser Daisy Muslin All-Stages Bassinet Sheet Rainbow Muslin All-Stages Midi Crib Sheet Pure Core 4 Midi Crib Mattress Shown In White and Natural White and Natural - - -

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: We just put the crib together and it is beautiful. Would highly recommend to anyone to just get the natural color. The packaging is great and makes it easy to start with building the bassinet, it is well made and I love that you have the midi crib option. I also love that it comes with the bassinet and midi pad, a huge benefit compared to its competitors. Overall, we’re really happy with this purchase and can’t wait to see the little one in there.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pretty, versatile, and sturdy
reviews.reviewText: Just put together for baby due next month. It was a real struggle for one person to put together. It looks great and feels sturdy. Just put it together in the room where it will stay. Couldn't fit through door, so had to take portions apart to get it in the baby's room. Love the stages/sizes of basinet, high crib, lowered crib, and toddler bed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Wood quality is good, not so much the attachments
reviews.reviewText: We like the style and the fact that it can be converted into bassinet, mini crib and a full crib. Definitely recommend if you are pro sustainability. However, the joints are misaligned and it looks/feels a bit cheap because of that. The wood quality is good overall.Will update more when we move on to the full crib.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for my son and his wife for their new baby and they love it. They think it's perfect for babies in all stages, birth to age 2. They were very happy with the sturdiness of the crib and how easy it was to put together.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I got this crib specifically for the bassinet option so we don’t have to buy a bassinet and a crib and it’s perfect. It’s very sturdy and the mattress it came with fits snug

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for us
reviews.reviewText: This crib is perfect for us. It’s well made - doesn’t look or feel cheap. The bassinet on wheels is part of why I chose this. We don’t have any stairs in our house so being able to bring the bassinet with us where ever we go is extremely helpful and made is so we didn’t need to get a bunch of other loungers.Also love the fact that it will grow with her.Easy to put together - directions are very straight forward

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars For a premium product the quality is lacking
reviews.reviewText: So the many different usages and assembly options are a big plus. We started with the first one the bassinet, but are looking forward to the other options over the coming years.The bassinet has a low height, but just flipping the sides allows much higher bassinet as in their video. But some screws in where the holes are for safety.However, for the premium price they are charging the quality is not up to par. Many pieces have knicks from the production and the alignment is not good, in that there are larger gaps between pieces and some pain when trying to assemble as some pressure is needed to make the pieces fit.So the functionalities are great, but at the price point the quality is not (yet) good enough. I would pass on it at $600.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best choice for a crib
reviews.reviewText: Love love love this crib! We don't have a lot of space so starting with the bassinet size was amazing. Didn't even realize how convenient it would be to move around on wheels and pull close to the bed each night. Recently moved up to the midi size and it's still so light to be able to pull next to the bed each night. This crib is a game changer!
